H0.text: Keep the rabbit's body warm is the purpose of a rabbit's fur growing thicker in late fall.

H1.text: Keeping the rabbit safe from predators is why a rabbit’s fur grows thicker in late fall.

H2.text: Help the rabbit find a mate is the purpose of a rabbit’s fur growing thicker in late fall.

H3.text: Help the rabbit find green plants is the purpose of a rabbit’s fur growing thicker in late fall.

A4.text: mammals' hair helps temperature, but offers a niche for ectoparasites
